blog.description: Mibba is a creative writing site designed for authors to share their stories, poems and articles and gain feedback from a growing audience.

title: Rory's Journal [Do Not Open]
body:
This story follows Rory Finley, your average Scottish/English boy, in his epic adventure through life showing aspects of letting go, friendship and forgiveness.

July 7th, 2011

Van and I landed in the States yesterday up in New York. We’re going to spend the day walking around New York City and then heading up to Niagara Falls tonight.I’m the most nervous about this date…

Read more…

summary:
Michael Sheen Inspired By Good Omens Fanfic For Aziraphale's Love Of Crowley  

Michael Sheen, one of the stars of the upcoming...
caption:
Michael Sheen Inspired By Good Omens Fanfic For Aziraphale’s Love Of Crowley 

Michael Sheen, one of the stars of the upcoming Amazon Prime adaptation of Good Omens, has confessed that he turned to the large body of fanfic inspired by the 1990 novel on which to base his portrayal of the angel Aziraphale. Michael co-stars with David Tennant, who plays the demon Crowley in the six-part series which is due to launch worldwide in the first quarter of 2019. He spoke about the show in an interview with The Telegraph.

Continue reading

summary: The main reason I don’t really ship either Rose or River with the Doctor is that I don’t think either of them saw the Doctor for...
body:
Rose vs River (Long Post)

The main reason I don’t really ship either Rose or River with the Doctor is that I don’t think either of them saw the Doctor for who he really was.

Don’t get me wrong, I really really love both characters and generally liked the relationships they had with him, but there’s just always been something about both of them that never sat well with me.

Rose:

Rose’s problem was that she never really got her head around just how old the Doctor was. Yeah, she knew he was over 900 years old, but it never really seemed to sink in that he’d actually been living all that time.

A good example of when this shows is School Reunion. Before this episode she’s happy with the Doctor but when she’s confronted with the fact that he’d had a very, very long life before her she became confused and angry.

It isn’t exactly her fault. She met him at the young age of 19 (or 18, if you count the year she missed). It’s easy to forget that people had a life before you, like when you’re little and can’t really comprehend your parents living before you were born.

But with a creature as old and complex as the Doctor, you really have to understand the ancient part of him to actually understand him.

River:

River, on the other hand, has the exact opposite problem. She gets the age, lifespan, and complexity. She understands his depth and the ancient part of him that is so hard for a person with a average human lifespan to comprehend. She even compares him to a ‘mountain’ or a ‘sunset’.

But with that analogy, she also reveals that she doesn’t understand the other aspect of her husband that Rose did get.

His ‘human’ side.

The humany, intensely emotional side of him that literally makes the Doctor who he his. The Doctor loves the people he surrounds himself with such intensity. He’s passionate about each one in a different way. He never forgets them and why he loves each one and why they are so special to him. Why he always takes another companion even though it always ends in heartbreak for him.

River has trouble understanding that part of the Doctor. And it’s every bit as important as the other part of him.

Now, if you want a character that DOES understand both, look no further than:

Clara

Yeah, I know she wasn’t in a romantic relationship with him, but that isn’t the point.

She just seems to get it. She knows that he genuinely loves her (albeit non romantically) and that there is very little he wouldn’t do for her.

But she also knows that he existed before her, and that there will be a time where he exists after her. She’s seen his timeline in a way that basically no one else has, and she’s okay with it.

The fact that he would one day move on and find a new best friend to share Time and Space with doesn’t threaten her. She knows that the next person will never really take her place, just as she would never really take the place of those that came before her. She’s special to him in her own way, and that’s enough.

(None of the gifs or pics are mine)

summary: My musician life goal is to take a brass band, dress up as Santas, go play in the streets, please normal people with our music...
body: My musician life goal is to take a brass band, dress up as Santas, go play in the streets, please normal people with our music and scare Doctor Who fans to death.

blog.name: oimatchstickman
blog.title: Manic Pixie Dream Doctors
blog.description:
A cosplayer, seamstress, and retail worker who has many fictional interests such as: Doctor Who, Phantom of the Opera, Star Trek, Marvel, Portal, Disney, Pixar, Phineas and Ferb, M*A*S*H, Les Miserables, Into the Woods, and any other fandom I feel like.

But mostly Doctor Who.

I like all the Doctor Who I've seen- including Moffat's era- and no hate is tolerated. At all. Let me and others enjoy our show without constantly picking at the smallest thing thanks.

Raúl Esparza & Broadway Masterlist Jason Isaacs & Star Trek Masterlist

I'm Steffi, 29 and from Germany. I'm a self-taught artist and I love to make people happy with all my heart❤️. Hope you enjoy your time on my blog. I'm also on Twitter as larkistin89.

summary: Am I allowed to say that I‘m a bit proud of this one? 😅 David Tennant drawing Nr. 6: More Doctor Who⁠ ⁠. This time the Tenth...
